author: Dr. Smith
note_text: Assessment: Acute on chronic heart failure exacerbation. BNP elevated to 530. Weight up 2 kg per patient. Plan: Increase furosemide for 3 days, follow up with cardiology within 1 week. Return to ED if worsening shortness of breath.

author: Dr. Lee
note_text: Assessment: Type 2 DM, A1c 9.2%. Plan: reinforce adherence to metformin 1,000 mg BID, discuss adding GLP-1 RA. Follow up 3 months. Review of systems: negative except mild dyspnea on exertion.

author: Dr. Patel
note_text: Impression: HF stable. Patient on lisinopril 10 mg daily and metoprolol succinate 50 mg. BNP 180. Plan: continue current therapy, low-sodium diet, monitor weight, follow up 3 months.
